TopicTitle: Can someone make a video on how to make planets with Kopernicus mod?

Articles.Content:
So im having problems with making a planet with Kopernicus mod (kerbals can't stand on my planet, kerbals clip through ground...).

Can someone help me or make a video?

(Kopernicus Examples are not working/outdated)
Modding question moved to the modding subforum.

So im having problems with making a planet with Kopernicus mod (kerbals can't stand on my planet, kerbals clip through ground...).

Can someone help me or make a video?

(Kopernicus Examples are not working/outdated)

I second this!
I need it too!

Guys, wait a couple of months till the new examples from KillAshley come around. Although it is taking a while... For now a video would be nice, but the examples would be more of a help.

So im having problems with making a planet with Kopernicus mod (kerbals can't stand on my planet, kerbals clip through ground...).

Can someone help me or make a video?

(Kopernicus Examples are not working/outdated)

I did it with a LOT of trials and errors. A video or written tutorial seems a great idea.

I did it with a LOT of trials and errors. A video or written tutorial seems a great idea.

Personally I'm trying to add some planets and moons before to create a whole new system. I've been able to see my planets in tracking station, I consider this a good starting point. Now I'm struggling with texturies for my world. Better to say I'm trying to create textures, because I can't create working dds files. I agree that written/video tutorials AND examples would be a great boost to my comprehension in planet making.
I recommend looking into the other planet pack's configs...
